version_description: Enhanced App stability
Enhanced App stability

1. Added the "Switch Wallet" tab at the top bar in the App
2. Enabled DOT max transfer

1. Added the "Switch Wallet" tab at the top bar in the App
2. Enabled DOT max transfer

1. Enhanced the compatibility for the node upgrade of the KSM and DOT network. (Firmware needs to update to V1.0.25)
2. Supported Russian

1. Enhanced the compatibility for the node upgrade of the KSM and DOT network. (Firmware needs to update to V1.0.25)
2. Supported Russian

1. Enhanced the compatibility for the node upgrade of the KSM and DOT network. (Firmware needs to update to V1.0.25)
2. Supported Russian

1. Enhanced the compatibility for the node upgrade of the KSM and DOT network. (Firmware needs to update to V1.0.25)
2. Supported Russian

1. Fully supported VeChain, VET and VeChain tokens
2. Added risk warning for non-backup wallets (3 days per warning)
3. Supported Turkish, Indonesian and Thai
4. Optimized the PassPhrase setting UI of the wallet creation UI in the SafePal App
5. Added 'Join hardware wallet user group' invitation in the App. Users will see the invitation once a S1 hardware wallet is paired with the SafePal App.
6. Optimized the TRX miner fee pop-up display

1. Fully supported VeChain, VET and VeChain tokens
2. Added risk warning for non-backup wallets (3 days per warning)
3. Supported Turkish, Indonesian and Thai
4. Optimized the PassPhrase setting UI of the wallet creation UI in the SafePal App
5. Added 'Join hardware wallet user group' invitation in the App. Users will see the invitation once a S1 hardware wallet is paired with the SafePal App.
6. Optimized the TRX miner fee pop-up display

1. Supported the light mode
2. Fixed the VET transfer issue
3. Fixed compatibility issues in DApp login, withdrawal and picture upload

1. Supported the light mode
2. Fixed the VET transfer issue
3. Fixed compatibility issues in DApp login, withdrawal and picture upload
* Fixed the signing compatibility issue of some edge cases
* Fixed the signing compatibility issue of some edge cases

1. Supported App lock
2. Supported Face ID
3. Supported fast payment
4. Supported custom derivative path setting during wallet recovery
5. Added DApp node settings

1. Supported App lock
2. Supported Face ID
3. Supported fast payment
4. Supported custom derivative path setting during wallet recovery
5. Added DApp node settings

1. THETA and Polygon supported
2. Hardware Wallet firmware update notification
3. Other improvements

1. THETA and Polygon supported
